TopicTitle: The new vehicle portraits are nice but what controls the orientation?

Articles.Content: I am updating all my vehicles for the patch and this includes updating the portraits.  But at least one aerial vehicle is portrayed side on instead from on top which is better for a plane.  I see that my motorcycles are pictured from the side which is good.  Any way to change the orientation?

It turns out that the length to width ratio of the vehicle is what controls this.  A thin vehicle will be pictured side on and a fat vehicle like most planes will be pictured from the top.  My one plane had a very arrow shaped look and was pictured from the side.  Adding some detachable girders on the side increased the width and now the portrait shows it from above like all the other aerial vehicles I have made.
